originalText: tch_theodore
Start Element
theodore
The Faceless are here!

::The man behind the counter strikes you as being calm, friendly and radiates a positive attitude. Appearance-wise, young and handsome are the words that describe him most accurate, while his confident posture is also difficult to ignore. He greets you with a familiar Tchortist salute.::

Tchort is evolution, $(#brother/sister). My name is Theodore, often called Theo by... by almost everyone. ::He smiles.:: How may I help you?
Hungry again, $(#brother/sister)?
context.loc_tch_invasionStarted
context.npc_tch_theodore_met
Evolution is Tchort, brother. I'm $(context.player.Name).
Tchort is handsome... I mean you're evolution... You're handsome! That's the one! And I'm $(context.player.Name).
Welcome to the Institute of Tchort, $(#brother/sister). Our institution is very different from those on the outside I'm sure, but you'll get used to it, don't worry.
::He laughs.:: Don't worry, $(#brother/sister), we'll fill that belly of yours in just a moment. What'll it be?
Uhm... While I should thank you for the compliment, our greeting is not something that should be twisted in such a manner. Please, make sure you always say the phrase in its proper form.
Show me what you got. I'm starving!
English
Show me what you got. I'm starving! ::Barter.::
What can you tell me about the Faceless?
Hey, do you want to hear a joke?
Hi, I'd like one cute Theo for takeout. Hot if possible.
Hi, I wanted to ask you something really important, but was stunned by how handsome you are. Now I can't remember.
::Wave and wink at him seductively.::
I'm new to the Institute of Tchort. Could you give me directions to your room?
My lips hurt! Will you kiss them and make the pain go away?
Today's we have...

I am institute-born, $(#brother/sister). It wasn't my decision to become a Tchortist, but with all the things I heard about the outside world, I'm better off. Life here is better without a doubt, and here people care about each other, care about progress - evolution, rather than just about their own hide, so to speak.
Keep the Faceless out of the refectory please, people are trying to eat here.
It is dangerous, do not go there.
Is it the one about a cell undergoing mitosis?
I'm sorry, but I'm working at the moment, and a discussion about Tchortism would take too long.
Sorry, we are not serving Theo today. Are you perhaps interested in something else?
That happens pretty often actually, so don't worry about it.
::He waves back and leans forward slightly, as if he is going to wink. However, he stops, eyes wide open. Then, he shrugs his shoulders.::
Certainly, exit the refectory, up the stairs, then take four left turns, down the stairs and then turn right.
You know, sister, maybe I can help you with that...
Tchort guides, $(#brother/sister).
That I am. ::Smiles:: What'll it be, $(context.player.Name)?
Apology accepted. Now, what'll it be, $(context.player.Name)?
::Barter.::
Magnificent Tchort! Stop mentioning those... those vomit-inducing freaks here - we are trying to eat!
It is that simple, $(#brother/sister).
No, it's about a rathound that walks into a bar - and the barkeeper shoots the filthy thing!
Seek Praepostor Amelia, or visit Eidein's Library. Oh, and read the Original Report if you haven't already.
Hopper stew is hot too, sister.
While you're trying to remember, maybe grab something to eat, sister?
Oh no, I guess we are out of winks. How about hopper stew?
See you soon, sister!
No. Again, from what I heard in the past... I'm better off being here.
Yes, what?
That's what I was talking about...
::He laughs.:: 'Cause everyone hates rathounds! Yes, I like that one.
Sorry, $(#brother/sister), already heard that one. One of the genetics investigators already told it to me.
Or, I better leave it to the professional. Jerre-Franz's medical office is right past the sleeping quarters; he'll give you something for the pain. Trust me, he is the best.
I am sorry but I can't explain it now, $(#brother/sister) - this is neither the time nor the place for that. This is where people eat and I have got my hands a bit busy at the moment.
Apex joke, $(#brother/sister).
Need anything else?
::Leave without saying anything.::
Maybe some other time, $(#brother/sister); now's not the time. Anything else you needed? And please, let's make it quick, refectory is always a busy place.

Just trust me... it is dangerous; there is a reason no one goes there.

Now, $(#brother/sister), are you ordering something or not?
Hungry?
